image_assets.hero_background: Use a subtle CSS gradient (bg-gradient-to-b from-blue-50 to-white). No heavy stock photos.
image_assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons for all visual indicators.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. IMPLEMENT MOBILE-FIRST: Start with mobile layout. Ensure touch targets are 44px+.
2. STICKY CTA IS CRITICAL: Implement the fixed bottom button for mobile screens (< md). It must be always visible.
3. PERFORMANCE: Use standard tags or optimized next/image if available. Avoid heavy JS animations. Use simple CSS transitions.
4. NO NAVIGATION: Do not add a hamburger menu or complex links. The only goal is the CTA.
5. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to the main CTA button ('hero-cta', 'sticky-cta') and input fields if any.
6. FONTS: Import 'Outfit' and 'Inter' from Google Fonts in the main CSS or HTML head.
7. SHADCN: Use Shadcn UI 'Button' and 'Card' components but customize them to match the 'rounded-xl' and 'shadow-sm' aesthetic.
8. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure text contrast is high (Slate-600+ on White). Use semantic HTML (<main>, <section>, <h1>).

do_not_use: Generic 'Lorem Ipsum' - use the provided Spanish copy
must_do: Ensure the sticky button has a high z-index (z-50)
Use 'tracking-tight' for all headings to make them look modern
